'''Dip, Duck, Dive, Dodge, Defeat''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat an [[Oceanid]] without being hit by water bombs left behind by certain [[Hydro Mimics]].

==Trivia==
It is currently unknown if dodging with [[Kaedehara Kazuha|Kazuha's]] [[Chihayaburu]]/[[Venti|Venti's]] [[Skyward Sonnet]] or by climbing/elevating on [[Geo Constructs]] would count as "not being hit by water bombs".
